author: _shemnon
content: The SSTORE costing has the feel of pushing the difficulty bomb back.  It's based on the size of mainnet yet applies to all chains regardless of size.

author: _shemnon
content: For me a more interesting approach would be to have the cost scale by storage size, either of the contract or of the whole chain.  But this would present two major problems: (a) clients would have to accurately count leaf nodes and (b) tooling would need to take into account a moving target on SSTORE when estimating gas.

author: _shemnon
content: Perhaps this could be rolled into verkle research.
